channel.title: Was healed while was jailed
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was healed from Nightshade or Bleed in night I was jailed.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Probably, healer hadn't to be allowed to visit me in prison.
#### Steps to reproduce: Put someone with poison or bleed in jail and heal him.
#### Comments: I'm sorry if it is normal mechanics and not a bug. Unfortunately, I don't remember my class and who healed me since I thought it was normal mechanics and decided not to report immediately. Now I've changed my mind.
